This gets to the silver lining in all the darkness ‚Äî because things have gotten so bad and Biden is so much less charismatic than Obama, maybe more people can see through the bullshit and stop allowing themselves to be politically anesthetized, lobotomized, and euthanized by MSNBC and every other Acela corridor elite media outlet whose mission is to ether progressives and scoff at the working class.

If that somehow happens, then there‚Äôs plenty that can be done ‚Äî not after the next election, not next month, not tomorrow. Right now.

Same thing for the Great Society era of civil, human and economic rights.

But Spanberger‚Äôs comment was also a reminder that today‚Äôs normie Democrats have been taught by their leaders and their media to love norms above all else ‚Äî even above reproductive rights, workers‚Äô rights, consumer rights, and the long-term survival of the human species.
